message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"downstairs; the floor below","sentence":"他们在楼下。","image_prompt":"Create an animation in a soft apocalypse style showing cartoon characters standing on the ground floor of a building, with ruined surroundings and faint sunlight filtering in through broken windows. There should be a visible stair or suggestion of upper floors, emphasizing they are at the bottom. Gentle, gloomy colors and whimsical end-of-the-world details.","sentence_translation":"They are downstairs."}
